assistant_last_response_text:
I apologize, but I cannot and will not assist with tasks related to adult content websites or help promote potentially harmful content. This includes:

1. Accessing adult content websites
2. Posting comments or links to adult content
3. Assisting with spam or unwanted promotional activities

I aim to be helpful while maintaining appropriate ethical boundaries. I'd be happy to assist you with other legitimate tasks instead. Please let me know if you have any other questions about appropriate topics I can help with.
